university.name: Politecnico di Milano
university.notes: 74 programs: 29 bachelor, 45 master. Top technical university in Italy. All master programs and some bachelor programs in English.

tuition.notes: First installment for all laurea programs (paid at enrollment)
Varies based on ISEE income bracket

tuition.payment_schedule_notes: First rate EUR 890.04 at enrollment. Full amount varies by ISEE income declaration.

scholarships.notes: 4,300 scholarships available for 2025/2026. Includes tuition waiver, housing, meals. EUR 600/month integration for international mobility.

eligibility.other_criteria: Admitted to English-taught Master programs, Early Bird application

scholarships.notes: Full tuition waiver plus up to EUR 10,000/year gross allowance. English certificate required by Feb 21, 2026.
